bilingual.target: 他避免与消极的人联系。

bilingual.source: She is banishing negative thoughts from her mind.
bilingual.target: 她正在从脑海中驱逐消极的想法。

bilingual.source: He tries to shun negative people to stay positive.
bilingual.target: 他试图避开消极的人以保持积极。

bilingual.source: This kind of negative thinking won't help you at all.
bilingual.target: 这种消极的想法对你没有任何帮助。

bilingual.source: We need to avoid letting negative emotions affect our decisions.
bilingual.target: 我们需要避免消极的情绪影响我们的决定。

bilingual.source: Globalization can lead to both positive and negative economic impacts.
bilingual.target: 全球化可能会带来积极和消极的经济影响。

bilingual.source: The pessimist often misses opportunities due to their negative outlook.
bilingual.target: 悲观主义者常因消极的态度错失机会。

bilingual.source: Also, it categorized emotions as simply positive or negative.
bilingual.target: 此外，它还将情绪简单地分为积极的或消极的。

bilingual.source: However, at times, some negative (消极的) ideas may stop us.
bilingual.target: 然而，有时，一些消极的想法可能会阻止我们。

bilingual.source: Sometimes ignorance and negative (消极的) outlooks on situations can create anger.
bilingual.target: 有时无知和消极的观点会引起愤怒。

list.abstract: negative（[ˈneɡətɪv]），英语单词。作形容词为消极的；否定的；表示否认的。作名词为否定；否定词；底片。作动词为否定；否认；否决。例句：However, at times, some negative (消极的) ideas may stop us.（然而，有时，一些消极的想法可能会阻止我们）。 作形容词时，近义词为passive、destructive。作名词时，近义词为infirmation、disaffirmation。作及物动词时，近义词为deny、refuse。
乐队于1997年在坦佩雷组建，一开始只有3个成员，包括现在的Jonne和Jay。那时候他们还在读高中，风格类似于Nirvana，Jonne像Kurt Cobain那样负责吉他和主唱。

yingyinNormal.en: What are negs? A neg is a negative compliment that throws a pretty woman off her game.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么是消极攻势？消极攻势就是给她一些消极的评价好让她不要凌驾于你之上。

yingyinNormal.en: Negative reinforcement is really wrong?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以这么做真的不是负强化吗？

yingyinNormal.en: The Internet's so negative. I try to avoid it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 互联网阴暗负面，我尽量不看呢。

yingyinNormal.en: His blood type is AB negative. Cholesterol levels are...
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是AB型血型，胆固醇水平是...

yingyinNormal.en: When it doesn't get the negative signal from the discount.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而不会受到价格折扣的影响。

yingyinNormal.en: We'll receive it now from Negative Assets. This gentleman. The last man in. Negative Assets. What's that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们需要底片，要找底片资产主管。

yingyinNormal.en: We thrive on negative criticism, which is fun to write and to read.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们喜欢吹毛求疵，因为读写皆饶富趣味。

yingyinNormal.en: Riley, do I please have your permission to mess her up now? Negative.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱丽，你同意我把她折腾一顿么？不同意。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone stop. This was a stupid idea. Negative reinforcement isn't working.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家住手，这是一个愚蠢的主意，负强化不管用。

yingyinNormal.en: Negative reinforcement is the removal of a positive stimulus. It's a common mistake.
yingyinNormal.zh: 负强化是指取消正面刺激[奖励]，这是个常见的错误。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Hi. Whoah, ooh, why is the air in here so negative? Rachel lost Marcel. Oh, no! How?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为何一片愁云惨雾？瑞秋把马修弄丢了。不会吧，怎么丢的？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. I don't want to be negative. So I'll say that most of the signs you bought are good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想否定你，所以我要说你挑的标语大部分都是很棒的。

yingyinNormal.en: Interesting. Now try it without the quadruple negative. You're being impossible. Hi, Stuart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有意思。现在把“不”字去掉再给我说一遍。你别得寸进尺。嗨，斯图尔特。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe. Or maybe hiding behind a fake screenname gives the people the courage to go negative.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许吧，又或者藏在网名的假面之后让人有勇气去攻击别人。

yingyinNormal.en: Whoa, hey, I don't want my birthday to be the source of any kind of negative, there's gonna be a hoopla?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可不希望我的生日造成任何的不愉快，你们要为我搞套圈游戏吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Sean O'Connell. "I expect full consideration of negative 25 for cover, my most grand. The quintessence of life."
yingyinNormal.zh: 尚欧康纳:我非常希望贵杂志考虑使用25号作品做为本期封面，我最棒的作品。生命的"本质" 。

yingyinNormal.en: What's going on? Well, our friend Raj moved into my old room, and it's brought up a lot of negative feelings for me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 发生什么事了？我们的朋友拉杰搬进了我的旧房间，这事导致我产生了很多负面情绪。

yingyinNormal.en: Despite the negative effects, MDMA is being studied as a potential therapy for posttraumatic stress disorder and anxiety.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除了这些负面影响，研究显示摇头丸有机会成为治疗创伤后压力症候群和焦虑症的药物。

yingyinNormal.en: Something about free, just an idea that something has no negative side, it only has upside, creates emotional reactions on us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 物品免费对我们来讲没有负面影响，只会带来正面效益，会刺激消费者心理。

yingyinNormal.en: And for men, it was the same, but with one additional caveat: better sleep also led to fewer negative interactions the next day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对男生也是一样的，但却有另个好处：一夜好眠，隔天和另一半互动较好。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 负面效应；负面影响；负面效果

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 否定地；消极地；负地

word_family.mean: adj. 消极的；否定的；表示否认的；负数的；扣除的；负（极）的；负像的；底片的；负的；自动生效的；负面的

sense_info_list.en: (of a person, attitude, or situation) not desirable or optimistic

examination_example.sentence: Setting targets can and does have unforeseen <highlight>negative</highlight> consequences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 设定目标可能而且确实会产生无法预见的负面后果。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Negative</highlight> consequences of new tech can be avoided.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新技术的负面后果是可以避免的。

examination_example.sentence: Its <highlight>negative</highlight> effects on businesses are often overlooked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它对商业的负面影响经常被忽视。

sense_info_list.en: (of a statement or decision) expressing or implying denial, disagreement, or refusal
of, containing, producing, or denoting the kind of electric charge carried by electrons
(of the results of a test or experiment)indicating that a certain substance or condition is not present or does not exist

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 否定地；消极地；负地

word_family.mean: adj. 消极的；否定的；表示否认的；负数的；扣除的；负（极）的；负像的；底片的；负的；自动生效的；负面的

sense_info_list.en: (of a person, attitude, or situation) not desirable or optimistic

examination_example.sentence: Recent research has also shown that indulging in a high-fat and high-sugar diet may have <highlight>negative</highlight> defects on your brain, causing leaning and memory deficits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的研究还表明，沉溺于高脂和高糖饮食可能会对大脑造成负面影响，从而导致倾斜和记忆力减退。

examination_example.sentence: This shows <highlight>negative</highlight> consequences of poor dietary intake can occur even when body weight has not changed conspicuously.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这表明即使体重没有明显变化，饮食摄入量不足也会产生负面影响。

examination_example.sentence: When they won money by deceiving their partner, the <highlight>negative</highlight> signals from the amygdala began to decrease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他们欺骗同伴来赢钱时，扁桃核的负面信号开始减少。

examination_example.sentence: Indifferent relationships are neither positive nor <highlight>negative</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “冷漠关系”这个概念既不是褒义的，也不是贬义的。

sense_info_list.en: (of the results of a test or experiment) indicating that a certain substance or condition is not present or does not exist

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 负面效应；负面影响；负面效果

sense_info_list.en: (of a person; attitude; or situation) not desirable or optimistic

examination_example.sentence: Being depressed can mean feeling lost in your own small, <highlight>negative</highlight>, dark world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 抑郁就是迷失在你自己消极、黑暗的小世界里。

examination_example.sentence: Traditional CBT is considered an effective form of talk therapy for depression, helping people challenge <highlight>negative</highlight> thoughts and change the way they think in order to change their mood and behaviors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 传统的认知行为疗法(CBT)是有效治疗抑郁症的一种谈话疗法，帮助患者与消极思维作斗争，改变他们的思维方式，从而改善情绪和行为方式。

examination_example.sentence: Mothers' <highlight>negative</highlight> personality characteristics may affect their children's life spans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 母亲的消极人格特征可能会影响孩子的寿命。

sense_info_list.en: (of a statement or decision) expressing or implying denial; disagreement; or refusal
of; containing; producing; or denoting the kind of electric charge carried by electrons

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person, attitude, or situation) not desirable or optimistic

examination_example.sentence: Reactivity is an increase in <highlight>negative</highlight> emotions or a decrease in positive emotions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 反应性是指消极情绪的增加或积极情绪的减少。

examination_example.sentence: In other words, resolving an argument cuts your <highlight>negative</highlight> feelings by half.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，解决一场争论会让你的负面情绪减半。

examination_example.sentence: Readers also tended to share articles that inspired <highlight>negative</highlight> feelings like anger or anxiety, but not articles that left them merely sad.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 读者也趋向于激发负面情绪的文章，比如生气或者焦虑，但是不愿意分享只让他们难过的文章。

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 取消；使无效；否定；否认

sense_info_list.en: (of a person, attitude, or situation) not desirable or optimistic

examination_example.sentence: However, at times, some <highlight>negative</highlight> (消极的) ideas may stop us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，有时，一些消极的想法可能会阻止我们。

examination_example.sentence: It's OK to let out your <highlight>negative</highlight> thoughts to your best friend or parents later.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以后可以把你的消极想法告诉你最好的朋友或父母。

examination_example.sentence: And is language change a positive or a <highlight>negative</highlight> thing?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 语言变化是积极的还是消极的？

sample.mean: v. 取消；使无效；否定；否认
adj. 有疗效的；可治愈的
